attributes.title: Hi

attributes.review:
I downloaded the app a couple days ago cause I heard you’ll get free shrek merch😍. I patiently wait for my merchandise to arrive but NOTHING. Later on in the middle of the night I woke up to see Trump orange Oompa Loompa lookin ahh staring at me through my mirror, I say to myself go back to sleep you’re just hallucinating. When I woke up I saw a written message on my mirror saying “vote for trump or your soul will be mine”.... I wasn’t scared gurlllll I was 
maddddddd he messed up my mirror and my favorite lipstick... the audacity🙄. The next night my room was shaking while turning into the color orange like rlly do better😒, Trump orange Oompa Loompa lookin ahh showed up in my mirror AGAIN he instantly jumped on me and took me inside the mirror (if only I knew my mirror was a teleporting machine this could’ve came in handy some day💕🙈🤪⭐️). All I see is a room covered in trumps nudes and a cult chanting racial slurs.. they rlly thought this would be a threat to me bishhh plzzz I went up to them to confront about not receiving my free shrek merch then this one person hissed at me😳. I said “let’s go outside” they was like “go outside for what” then I said “we goin fight”, so I whooped all of themmm and tied them up together💅🏼, I also took trumps wig off too and yelled “BALD HEAD HO SHIII BALD HEAD HO SHIII GET IT BBBB” he started crying😍 ahaha. Anyways I went back to my room and deleted the app everything went back to normal after I did. Sadly I didn’t get my shrek merch😞.
attributes.title: ✨🧚🏼‍♀️remove this app✨🧚🏼‍♀️
